name: FUT SBC Wizard
description:
You have a lot of players in your club and your want to complete the SBC's from your favorite soccer game? This App will help you solving the puzzles with sophisticated search algorithm using AI.

- Choose from a library of players
- Add Players to your club
- Remove Players from your club
- Change the overall rating of the players
- Change the position of your player
- Change the loyalty of your player
- Add players by scanning the from the screen
- Your Club Players will be stored
- Your current SBC will be stored

We will constantly improved this App and will listen to your feedback.

To discover SBCs which might be in your team:
1. Add players to your team
2. Create or choose an SBC
3. Press Solve
